fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Environment, Climate Action
head_office_address: Unit A-37-1 Menara UOA Bangsar No 5 Jalan Bangsar Utama 1
eu_initiatives: The RSPO follows EU activites related to palm oil and other deforestation-risk commodities, including the European Commission's action plan on deforestation and related activities in the Parliament.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
ISEAL - https://www.isealalliance.org/our-members/full-members 
 
HCV Resource Network - https://www.hcvnetwork.org/resource-network/members 
 
ECOSOC - http://undocs.org/E/2016/INF/5,  
 
UNGC - https://www.unglobalcompact.org/what-is-gc/participants
goals__remit: RSPO is a not-for-profit that unites stakeholders from the 7 sectors of the palm oil industry: oil palm producers, processors or traders, consumer goods manufacturers, retailers, banks/investors, and environmental and social non-governmental organisations (NGOs), to develop and implement global standards for sustainable palm oil.
industry_forums: European Sustainable Palm Oil Advocacy Group (ESPOAG)
